column4: Hi, I have an acer timelinex with "Intel Corporation 5 Series/3400 Series Chipset HD Audio", and I can't seem to get my mic working!  I can get audio output working fine and the external mic works, just not the internal.  Does anyone have any recommendations?
first thing i would check in open a terminal  type    alsamixer   , see if any of the sliders are down or muted for headphones
norc: All the channels are on (especially the "internal microphone boost")
mm ok,, not sure then,, I am not the best person for sound issues,, did you check also in the #pulseaudio and #alsa channels ? ..yes?
